Hi Michael,

On 12.04.2009, at 19:15, Michael Schuerig wrote:

> Would it be fair to summarize this and the linked articles as "the
> experts still need to make up their minds and their's no clear way  
> to go
> for practitioners yet"?

Yes, I think that's a fair summary.

Stefan
